H0.text: Who was US Defence Secretary during the 'war' against Afghanistan. Colin Powell

H1.text: Who was US Defence Secretary during the 'war' against Afghanistan. Dick Cheney

H2.text: Who was US Defence Secretary during the 'war' against Afghanistan. George Tenet

H3.text: Who was US Defence Secretary during the 'war' against Afghanistan. Ramsfeld

A4.text: Cheney served as Secretary of Defense from March 1989 to January 1993.

A5.text: The U.S. invasion of Afghanistan began in 2001.

A6.text: Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld aimed to carry out operations in Afghanistan rapidly and leave as fast as possible.

A7.text: CIA director George Tenet argued that the US should target al-Qaeda but 'hold off on the Taliban,'
